sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card class="ma-4" elevation="0">
    <v-list-item>
      <template
          v-for="category in formation.categories"
      >
        <v-subheader>
          {{ category.toUpperCase() }}
        </v-subheader>
        <template
            v-for="fmt in formation.values"
        >
          <v-list-item-content
              v-if="fmt.category === category"
          >
            <v-list-item-title>{{ fmt.exp }}</v-list-item-title>
            <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ fmt.date }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
          </v-list-item-content>
        </template>
      </template>
    </v-list-item>
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'PortfolioFormation',
  data: () => ({
    formation: {
      "values": [
        {
          "date": "2018",
          "exp": "Campeones. Dirigida por: Javier Fresser. Personaje: Jefe de Benito",
          "category": "Cine"
        },
        {
          "date": "2016",
          "exp": " Poveda. Dirigida por Pablo Moreno. Personaje: Padre de Marina",
          "category": "Cine"
        }
      ],
      "categories": [
        "Cine"
      ],
      "active": true
    }
  })
}
</script>
